name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Social Insights for Salesforce and LinkedIn

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find related Social and Salesforce data and create Salesforce leads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Social Insights is a chrome extension that shows details from Salesforce in your browser when viewing any LinkedIn Profile.  It also allows you to add leads/contacts to Salesforce from any LinkedIn profile including WORK EMAIL, name, company and job title.  You can try the extension for FREE for 7 days and or purchase it and get unlimited leads from LinkedIn for a low monthly fee.   

Here are some of the product's key features:
* Shows on and LinkedIn Profile
* Shows Salesforce Details from LinkedIn
* Open Lead/Contact in Salesforce from LinkedIn
* Save new Leads in Salesforce from any LinkedIn Profile
* Includes Name / Job Title / Company
* Retrieves WORK EMAIL ADDRESS
* Save New Contacts in Salesforce from any LinkedIn Profile
* Includes Name / Job Title / Company
* Can quickly create accounts in Salesforce

Save unlimited Leads from $9.95 (USD) per month
